00045 void Socket::UDP::receiveDatagram(string& outDatagram, Socket::Address& outPeer)
00046 {
00047     // reserve adequate buffer space (if needed)
00048     unsigned int lRecvBufSize = (unsigned int) getSockOpt(eRecvBufSize);
00049     if(outDatagram.size() < lRecvBufSize) outDatagram.resize(lRecvBufSize);
00050     // receive message
00051     unsigned int lRecv = receiveFrom(&outDatagram[0], outDatagram.size(), outPeer);
00052     // resize output string
00053     outDatagram.resize(lRecv);
00054 }
